Sinopse: When U.S.-based Siddharth visits his Indian home town with his new wife, he insists they stay at the ancestral home, laughing off family members' warnings of ghostly goings-on in the mansion. Will Siddharth's friend be able to solve this riddle?—gavin (gunmasterM@hotmail.com)
